alert.note: Alert for Indiana; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:59PM EDT until May 09 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, in southwest Pennsylvania, Westmoreland. In west central Pennsylvania, Armstrong and Indiana. * WHEN...Until 315 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 959 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Indiana, Vandergrift, Homer City, Apollo, Black Lick, North Apollo, Avonmore, Orchard Hills, West Lebanon, Chevy Chase Heights, Hyde Park, Elderton, Creekside, Shelocta, Jacksonville, Lucerne Mines, Brush Vly and Yellow Creek State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
